name: BizBook
short_description: Storing business contacts on your mobile phone a actual notebook is a thing of the past.BizBook is a new open source software to store your business contacts to easily store business's names,phone number,website,email and location.All your information is stored on a local database stored on your computer when running the program for the first time.NB:The database created contains all your contacts and login information so DO NOT delete it.So can also take your bizbook on the go by just copying the portable exe file along with your database on your flash drive.BizBook,the phonebook of the future.
summary: PhoneBook software for business or personal use.
